name: King Of The Rodeo
wikiSummary: "King of the Rodeo" is the third single taken from Kings of Leon's second album, Aha Shake Heartbreak. It was released in 2005 and charted at number 41 in the UK Singles Chart. It has been covered by Melbourne funk band The Bamboos on their album Side-Stepper.  The song was used in the season premiere of the second season of Entourage in the episode titled "The Boys Are Back in Town".
wikiText:
"King of the Rodeo" is the third single taken from Kings of Leon's second album, Aha Shake Heartbreak. It was released in 2005 and charted at number 41 in the UK Singles Chart. It has been covered by Melbourne funk band The Bamboos on their album Side-Stepper.
 
 The song was used in the season premiere of the second season of Entourage in the episode titled "The Boys Are Back in Town".
